response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I look forward to discussing this further with you and exploring how we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 500000}
